## Chess.isAttacked() method

Checks if a square is attacked by any piece

**Signature:**

```typescript
isAttacked(square: Square, color?: Color): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  square | [Square](./chess.ts.square.md) | Square to check |
|  color | [Color](./chess.ts.color.md) | _(Optional)_ Color of the attacking pieces |

**Returns:**

boolean
